mapper.select: SELECT id, name as productName, -- 数据库字段 name → 实体类 productName price, stock, description, create_time as createTime -- 数据库字段 create_time → 实体类 createTime FROM product
SELECT id, name as productName, price, stock, description, create_time as createTime FROM product WHERE id = #{id}
SELECT id, name as productName, price, stock, description, create_time as createTime FROM product WHERE id = #{id} FOR UPDATE -- 行级锁，防止并发更新冲突
mapper.update: UPDATE product SET stock = #{newStock} -- 移除 update_time（数据库表中未定义） WHERE id = #{productId} AND stock >= #{buyNum} -- 库存充足校验，防止超卖
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO product ( name, -- 数据库字段名：name price, stock, description, create_time ) VALUES ( #{productName}, -- 实体类属性名：productName #{price}, #{stock}, #{description}, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP -- 数据库自动填充创建时间（也可由程序传入） )
